HTMLMediaElementSinkId.summary: The HTMLMediaElement.sinkId read-only property of the Audio Output Devices API returns a string that is the unique ID of the device to be used for playing audio output.

remarks.para:
This ID should be one of the values returned from , id-multimedia, or id-communications.
If the user agent default device is being used, it returns an empty string.

HTMLMediaElementSinkId.value: A string indicating the current audio output device, or the empty string if the default user agent output device is being used.
